Entries.Lumisteria.SpecialOrders.WizardMonsterAr: I seek knowledge about {Monster:LocalizedName}. Anyone able to defeat 10 of them will get a reward.
Entries.Lumisteria.SpecialOrders.WizardPepperRex: I seek knowledge about Pepper Rex. Anyone able to defeat 3 of them will get a reward.
Entries.Lumisteria.SpecialOrders.WillyMagmaVolca: I saw bigger waves and more smoke than usual around the volcano. Can someone investigate and see if they can find a way to bring things back to normal ?
